column2: "I was thinking of throwing a welcome party for Akhtar and Khorshid. Do you want to come along, Leader?"

"We're going to have a barbecue on the beach! Eating delicious food and playing in the sea under that clear blue sky...
Oh, I can't wait!"

"Hold on. I understand how you feel, but it's not all fun and games.
...If we're going in our living bodies, I suppose we'll need sunscreen. Not to mention swimsuits..."
"Yes, we should take some time to get ready. For my part, I need to prepare my ingredients..."
"Sorry to bother you, Leader, but could you go down to the Coast and find us a good spot?"
